title: Murakami Rena: Kyûkyoku meikizuma
overview: Tommy, also known as Tomio, runs a Western-style pornographic distribution company. The next purchase is Las Vegas. He came to Tomio’s guesthouse with his mistress, Reina. Men and women who were open to sex were always coming and going there. Starring Rena Murakami, a legendary actress and stripper.
